body.p: We offer a number of HP Helion Public Cloud APIs. In addition, we have some public beta and private beta APIs that you can put to use, so please give them a try.

section.title: HP Helion Public Cloud APIs in General Availability
section.p: There are a number of HP Helion Public Cloud APIs available for your programming pleasure:

ul.li: Block Storage: API for HP Helion Public Cloud block storage; enabling additional volumes to Compute instances.

CDN: API for the HP Helion Public Cloud content delivery network (CDN) service; content inside HP Helion Public Cloud Object Storage can easily be cached on servers in metropolitan areas all over the world to speed client access to them by removing much of the network latency.
Compute: API for the HP Helion Public Cloud compute service; a way to instantiate virtual servers on publicly accessible physical machines hosted in HP data centers
DNS: API for the HP Helion Public Cloud Domain Name Service (DNS); enables display and management of DNS records.
v2 Identity service: V2 API for the HP Helion Public Cloud identity service; one-stop authentication for all HP Helion Public Cloud services.
v3 Identity service: V3 API for the HP Helion Public Cloud identity service; one-stop authentication for all HP Helion Public Cloud services.
Image: API for HP Helion Public Cloud Image; enabling managing of virtual machine images.
Networking: API for HP Helion Public Cloud Networking; enabling virtual network, subnet, router and port abstractions to describe network resources.
Object Storage: API for HP Helion Public Cloud object storage; a way to store and retrieve objects in a highly redundant cluster of publicly accessible physical machines hosted in HP data centers.
Relational Database: API for the HP Helion Public Cloud Relational Database service; simplifies the creation and management of MySQL database instances.
Monitoring v1.1: API for the HP Helion Public Cloud Monitoring v13.5; facilitates monitoring of the health and other metrics for the resources in HP Helion Public Cloud.

section.title: APIs in Private Beta
section.p: You can also avail yourself of one of the following APIs now in private beta; follow the links to sign up and begin trying them out!

ul.li: Load Balancer as a Service (LBaaS): API for the HP Helion Public Cloud Load Balancer service; facilitates creation and management of load balancers. Note: This service requires activation while in private beta; please request access on our sign-up page. Service use is free of charge during the private beta period.
